tooltip.hon.cold: This Item feels Cold to the touch
tooltip.hon.hot: This Item feels Hot to the touch
tooltip.hon.protectivegear: This Item protects from negative effect from hot/cold items, hold in offhand to use
tooltip.hon.right_hand_mitten_inactive: You only need this item if the bothHandMittens config is set to true
tooltip.hon.right_hand_mitten_active: This Item protects from negative effect from hot/cold items, hold in mainhand to use
